mcp_tools.name: amap_maps
mcp_tools.description: Query location information, geocoding, route planning, and POI search using Amap (高德地图) API. Supports Chinese cities and addresses.

api_tools.name: github_user_info
api_tools.description: Get GitHub user profile information including username, bio, public repositories count, and followers. This is a free API that works without authentication.

api_tools.name: weather_forecast
api_tools.description: Get weather forecast for any city worldwide. Returns temperature, humidity, wind speed, and 3-hour interval forecasts. (Requires valid RAPIDAPI_KEY)

place.description: City name with country code, e.g., 'London,GB', 'Beijing,CN'

api_tools.name: traffic_data
api_tools.description: Get real-time traffic congestion data for major cities. Returns traffic flow, congestion levels, and incident information.

code_tools.name: geopandas_spatial
code_tools.description: Perform spatial analysis on geographic data: buffer, intersection, union, spatial joins, coordinate transformations. Supports GeoJSON, Shapefile, and WKT formats.

geometry.description: GeoJSON geometry object or WKT string

distance.description: Distance parameter for buffer operation (in meters)
